request.title: Send a request
request.text: Fill out the form below and we will contact you.
request.name: Your name
request.type: How would you like us to contact you?
request.success: Your message has been sent successfully and we will contact you soon.

request.telegram_via_error: Please enter your @username so we can contact you via telegram.

text.t2: comes to life in my work

about.title: About Me
about.text: I am a Full-Stack JavaScript Developer
about.text2: I have several years of experience in frontend and backend development. My main areas of expertise are React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. I focus on quality, accuracy, and functionality in each project. My goal is to create modern, secure, and user-friendly web applications.
